Hi Joey! I actually did this 100% in HubSpot. We have Ops Hub as well but I wantted to make sure someone without coding knowledge understood this as well, I'll be making a post about it on here, to make it a bit clearer if soemone ever needs to do it themselves!
Oh very cool looking forward to it!
But that's a pretty dope presentation as well!
